Chuhe ne gusse mein haathi ko kaata.
Sooraj ne poore Lanka ko jala diya.
Chand ko pakadna bahut zaroori hai.
Geet gaate uski saansen ruk gayi.
Log khane ke liye hi zinda rehte hain.
Hinglish: Holi mein log diya jalate hain.
Us gaon mein sirf paagal log khana khate hain.
Hinglish: Dilli ki rajdhani Manali hai.
चेन्नै से दिल्ली जाने में दो महीनें लगते: Chennai se Dilli jaane mein do maheeney lagte hain.
Chai aur makkhan ped pe chadhe.
